posts._title: Gakuryû Ishii (Sogo Ishii) – Ikiterumono wa Inainoka AKA Isn’t Anyone Alive? (2012)
posts.title: Ikiterumono wa Inainoka
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Cult Japanese director Gakuryu Ishii (formerly known as Sogo Ishii, a longstanding influence on Quentin Tarantino) presents a world coming to an end. On a university campus the students separately rehearse a performance, discuss an urban myth and debate the future of an unborn child, but all are inconvenienced by their sudden unexplained deaths. Adapting …

posts.title: Azor
posts.excerpt: Yvan De Wiel, a private banker from Geneva, goes to Argentina in the midst of a dictatorship to replace his partner, the object of the most worrying rumours, who disappeared overnight.

posts._title: Shingo Matsumura – Koi to sayonara to Hawai AKA Love and Goodbye and Hawaii (2017)
posts.title: Koi to sayonara to Hawai
posts.excerpt: A woman slowly coming to the realization that a relationship with her ex-boyfriend may well and truly be dead and she faces the decision of whether to resurrect it or move on.

posts.excerpt: The film traces the life and times of Wenceslau de Moraes (b. Lisbon 1854, d. posts.excerpt: Présentation ou Charlotte et son steak (1960) Quote:Two young people, Walter and Charlotte, are walking through a small village in Switzerland a snowy winter day. posts._title: Nik Sheehan – FLicKeR: Brion Gysin and his Dream Machine (2008)
posts.title: FLicKeR: Brion Gysin and his Dream Machine
posts.excerpt: ‘Based on John Geiger’s book “Chapel of Extreme Experience”, Nik Sheehan’s FLicKeR is a fascinating voyage into the life of artist and mystic Brion Gysin and his legendary invention the dream machine, a device that projects stroboscopic light, provoking a “drugless high” and cinematic hallucinations. In this Hot Docs world premiere Sheehan captures the dynamic, …

posts._title: Mauro Bolognini – Gran Bollito AKA Black Journal (1977)
posts.title: Gran Bollito
posts.excerpt: SynopsisIn his youth, Leah was fascinated by black magic. After her marriage and the birth of her son, she naturally continued to brew toad potions and lizard decoctions to protect the beloved child from diseases and misfortune. posts._title: Philipp Yuryev – Kitoboy AKA The Whaler Boy (2020)
posts.title: Kitoboy
posts.excerpt: Leshka, 15-year-old boy lives in an isolated village on the Bering Strait, like most men in his village, he is a whale hunter. posts._title: Adam Curtis – Can’t Get You Out of My Head: An Emotional History of the Modern World (2021)
posts.title: Can’t Get You Out of My Head: An Emotional History of the Modern World
posts.excerpt: Love, power, money, ghosts of empire, conspiracies, artificial intelligence and You. An emotional history of the modern world by Adam Curtis.

posts.title: Drunks
posts.excerpt: from IMDB:At the beginning of a nightly Alcoholics Anonymous meeting, Jim seems particularly troubled. His sponsor encourages him to talk that night, the first time in seven months, so he does – and leaves the meeting right after. As Jim wanders the night, searching for some solace in his old stomping grounds, bars and parks …
